casebody.data:
BALDWIN
v.
CENTURY CARE CENTER. No. 626P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 9, 2007. Meredith T. Black, Raleigh, Colleen N. Shea, for Century Care Center.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of January 2007 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of January 2007."
